description: Try our easy to follow Crackers With Ham & Cheese + Fruity Lollipops recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crackers With Ham & Cheese + Fruity Lollipops Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g honeydew melon, peeled, cut into 1.5cm-thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: Top crispbread with ham and cheese. Serve with celery and tomatoes.

Snack 1: Using a star-shaped cutter, cut 3-4 stars from melon slices. Thread melon stars on wooden pop sticks to make ‘lollipops’. Combine yoghurt, honey and cinnamon in an airtight container. Serve lollipops with yoghurt to dip.
Snack 2: Place popcorn in an airtight container.
